title: Introducing EmbeddingGemma: The Best-in-Class Open Model for On-Device Embeddings
summary: Introducing EmbeddingGemma: a new embedding model designed for efficient on-device AI applications from Google. This open model is the highest-ranking text-only multilingual embedding model under 500M parameters on the MTEB benchmark, enabling powerful features like RAG and semantic search directly ...
content: Introducing EmbeddingGemma: a new embedding model designed for efficient on-device AI applications from Google. This open model is the highest-ranking text-only multilingual embedding model under 500M parameters on the MTEB benchmark, enabling powerful features like RAG and semantic search directly on mobile devices without an internet connection.
